name: ...But Ace Here Said You Deserved It!!
text:
Main You may rest 4 of your DON!! cards: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -3000 power during this turn. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less. 
Counted Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

effect.text: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -3000 power during this turn. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less.
Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
